Package arcade.potts.env.grid

Class PottsGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.env.grid.PottsGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grid
    public final class PottsGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements Grid
    Implementation of Grid for potts models.

    PottsGrid uses the cell id as the index to map to agents. Index 0 is reserved for a null object representing non-cell voxels in the potts layer.
